properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is my prophet, priest and king, A Prophet full of light, A Priest that stands 'twixt God and man, A King that rules with might.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is my meat, Christ is my drink, My medicine and my health, My peace, my strength, my joy, my crown, My glory and my wealth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Christ, he is the Heaven of heavens, My Christ what shall I call? My Christ is first, my Christ is last, My Christ is all in all.{/lang-eng}
